Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is without a shadow of a doubt one of the greatest, if not the best FPS shooters ever made. It is an extension of the already legendary iterations such as Counter-Strike 1.6 and Counter-Strike: Source. 

Whilst there are a lot of issues with the game - always has been - e.g cheaters especially, the game is rising in popularity still to this day after almost 10 years, which speaks for itself really. 

Fantastic job Valve - the implementation of skins changed the game and the industry completely.

Now please, add a good Anti-Cheat.
